caption: Knowledgeable and experienced workers

Just wanted to give DOM from Guest Services some recognition. I was looking for an item that was not on the floor, after letting him know I waited more than 20 mins at a different store, he took it upon himself to go to the back and grab the item! Now that is Customer Service! Thanks again Dom for the amazing service.

Integrity/ honesty is down the toliet.  After an online order,  we were contacted by customer service rep. Claiming  that we need to buy additional power packs ( each costa about 99.00)  or the power recliners wouldnt work. Does it make any sense when buying a power recliners, it wouldnt work without power packs? Also shouldnt it be mentioned online upon checking out that power packs is needed?  After all , we did buy power recliners and would expect it be powered up by electricity.  This doesnt make any sense at all.  After learning more about power packs , it is not necessary to have it but the way it was presented to me was that i would need it.  I believe these people in this company are trained to " hustle" people outa of their hard earned $ for something unnecessary.  Contacted the gentleman who told me i needed uncessart parts  from customer service back and magically when i told him that i want to cancell the order, he came back with a counter offer, that he claims the manger agreed to throw in all power packs at free of charge.   Hummm....  that would be 400 dollars worth of power packs.  Hummmm.....  The order was subsequently cancelled because i dont have the patience to play mind  games as it is wrong.

OMG, they are absolutely the absolute worst!  Go to their website and try to post a review.  They only allow five stars, such FRAUDS.  I ordered furniture 12/13/19, every Sunday they add a week to the delivery time.  They will not ship my furniture, they will not cancel my order, and they will not return my money.  I am reporting them to the State of NY and the BBB.  I will not stop giving bad reviews unless and until they give me my furniture or my money.

I would give 0 stars if I could. The owner of the store which is Adam is horrible,never keep up with his words and trained his staff to lie as well. I been dealing with this thief since I walked in his store. I advised you to stay away from this store, they will overprice you  for the same furniture that is a lot cheaper for a different store. Stay away from this store, very unprofessional. Dishonnest and  unprofessional Adam, poor customer service and lot of lies. They do a false advertisement stating there is a sale for 70% off but I got a much higher price. I am still going to fight them to update my price from $1350 which includes a bed, 2 night stands and a mirroir, however I returned 1 night stand back because the room was small. They did not update my price and it needs to be updates from $1350 to $1150. I will contact BBB and open up a claim. All they tells you is a lie, again stay away from this store. You have to call 100 times before someone picks up the phone, tells you different stories and promised to call you back which is never kept. I was told by Adam he will call me to give me the updated price which he never did. Adam who is the manager is never available neither by phone neither in person. Anytime you lucky to have someone on the phone, they will tell you he step out of the store. struggle before receiving a good items from a defected one,very hungry of money.

If I could give this furniture  store no stars. Cause it absolutely  deserves  0 00 stars. Went into store on sept.30 2019 to buy a tv stand.  TV  stand . It was a gift. However it wasnt enough room for it. I call the store numerous  time, to talk to someone  .cause I want to exchange it for something else. Finally   got 2 people over phone , was told I need to come in talk to manager. Here the con .manager  wanted to give 170.00 out of the 290.00 I paid for the unit. And he keeps 120.00. Told him no way cause the receipt  says I have  10  days  before  a delivery to request for a exchange,it only been 7.  This rude manager  walk away from me like I didnt matter, he wanted things his way. Well not with my hard earn money. I told him i will dispute  this bill with my credit card company. No way in hell was i going to let him cheat me  out of my money. I know what the  receipt  say. He couldn't  fine my orginal  receipt  . Held up a blank one told me  it state a restocking  fee.  I said to him show me it on my receipt I have in my hand.  Live in harlemv25 yrs. To all harlem residents beware of the con. Dont go into this store unless you want to be cheated if something goes wrong. Wish I check the reviews  before I went. Never would of look in the window..... Mr. Manager  I did dispute this bill and got all my damn money back!!!

If I could give negative stars I would. I wish I would've read these reviews first. SANDRA is HORRIBLE. Stay very far away from her. I have been fighting since March 1st 2019 with these people. Unprofessional from the staff to the owners. I will be contacting the BBB this week. I've had enough. I know not everyone has the same experience but I would take the advice from all of the negative reviews here. Do not waste your hard earned money!
Great store, highly recommended!! I got an awesome wall decor and sofa here-- they both look so nice.   Gave me extra discount too for checking in.
I went through so much for this couch they are unorganized and money hungry. They don’t answer the phone. Horrible service.
Very happy with the service that i got. Very helpful Staff. In love with my Bedroom Set & My Floor Mirror :) Would recommend this furniture store. They also be having good prices and sales too.

i wish i can give them a ZERO star review. I ordered my furniture 3/17/19 and was told that it will take 7-10 days so i gave them up until the 27th (10days) SINCE THE 27TH THEY HAVE BEEN GIVING ME THE RUN AROUND... I was told that my stuff will be int week of the 10th by Andy ( the person who made the sale) Again, not ok for me seeing that is well over the 7-10 days. When I referred to that, they told me 7-10 BUSINESS DAY. The 10th is well over 7-10 business days. I went on to ask for a manager and was given Adam. He and i went back and forth for a week and the entire time he blamed Ashley Furniture. I went on to tell him that i was going to call Ashley and let them know that he was bashing the company.. HE TOLD ME TO GO AHEAD AND DO THAT AND LET THEM KNOW THAT HE LOSES A LOT OF MONEY BECAUSE OF THEM. my plan was to get a refund but I told myself just wait the 2-3 extra days as opposed to ordering somewhere else... I was told that they will give me delivery for $40 IF I REMOVE THIS REVIEW... For my trouble i was offered a free area rug that apparently wasn't communicated between employees and when it because time to get the rug they were ugly. Then was told by Adam to give him until the day before my stuff was delivered to get more rugs which i agreed to and when i got the picture... the picture was of multiple choices OF THE BOTTOM OF THE RUG ROLLED UP... i called and told them how can i chose from that picture to only be told... that the manager can only do this rug (was sent a picture) to which i said i saw that one and it is damaged.. i will take that rug if its not the damaged ... GUESS WHAT.... they sent the DAMAGED.. so i took pictures and texted them and yup you guessed it.... NOW I AM BEING IGNORED. I GIVE UP!!!
1 Stop store furniture & electronics is amazing great sales people especially Sandra she was very patient with me . EVERYONE GO TO ONE STOP FURNITURE STORE. OH GREAT PRICES.!!!
Very nice store, and well experience staffs...

They're Very Horrible ! They Lie About When Your Furniture Will Be Delivered Just To Take Your Money & Have You Waiting ! Manager Is Never Available To Talk When Theres A Problem . Dont Spend Your Money There You Will Be Very Disappointed!! They Told Me 3-5 Business Days For My Furniture To Be Delivered Then No One Never Called . I Had To Go In & Finally Spoke To The Manager He Told Me Its 5-10 Business Days For Sure & It Wont Be No Problems But I'll Have It That Week Now The Week Is Here No One Called Me For A Scheduled Delivery So Now When I Call They Say Oh Its A Problem With The Manufacturer Company & Now I Have To Get A Refund When I Had A Functional For Friday & Thought It Would Be There It Is Now Wednesday & They're Just Telling Me To Come Get My Refund!! Dont do Business With Them They're Very Unorganized & Unprofessional.

Horrible experience.  I financed a bed and there were rates no one told me about although they swore they did, a friend was with me and didn't hear it either. Then I had to keep calling to find out when all of my furniture would be delivered, apparently it was scheduled for the following day. I purchased two dressers one broke immediately. They wouldn't answer the phone had to go to the store and the manager tried saying i broke the dresser when I literally just put my clothing into it. When they finally sent someone to fix it, they said they needed a piece and never contacted me again. I called and they finally replaced it, now the other dresser is falling apart doing the same thing as the first dresser.

While visiting family in vicinity, visited the store and had a very pleasant experience with the owner and staff. I ended up purchasing a dining room   set which arrived in timely manner as promised by owner. Thus far I am very happy with my purchase. My experience was seamless.
Stopped in looking for a mattress and got quoted a lower price until I came in to pick up was given a price that was 120 dollars more!! Dont trust this place!!!
I ordered my bed set and it is so beautiful!! The service was wonderful and so was the on time delivery
Great customer service!! Will be coming back and will be recommending all my friend to come here.

I had a greatest experience at this store, they have a really great customer service and great deals, they work with you if you need any adjustments, they are so different from all the other furniture store I been to they don’t treat you as they want only your money, they care to get you the exact things you want, everything happens very smooth and they deliver your items on time and put it together for you so u don’t have to worry about anything but I joy your new furniture. That’s my number 1 recommended furniture store for anyone who appreciates good service!!!!!

I had very nice experience with this place. Staff there is very professional and nice. They helped me pick my furniture and with very good price. I would highly recommend this place. I am definitely getting my more furniture from this place.

I had a great experience while shopping for furniture. I was looking for a bed room set and a living room set. I left out of this places highly satisfied! High quality furniture at a great price. They also provided me with a great payment plan that was affordable for me. I highly recommend this store!

(Translated by Google) Very good selections, many beautiful things. I love  Love it, beautiful furnitures. Im very happy.  (Original) Muy buena selecciones , muchas cosas bellas . Me encanta  Love it , beautiful furnitures . Im very happy.
Great store and wonderful staff!!! So much variety to choose from. Will definatly return to shop more!
Great service and good quality I highly recommend I love my purchase
I got a bed from here and it was fake wood and broke with in a day don't shop here!!! SCAM!!!! you can get the same things off Walmart at a decent price
I BOUGHT MY QUEEN BEDROOM SET HERE AND TRUST ME ITS WORTH EVERY PENNY I SPENT!!!! THE SALES REP ARE SO FRIENDLY... I CANT WAIT TO GET FURNITURE FOR MY KIDS HERE!!!!
Omg I bought my king bedroom set from this store and it looked so amazing, the customer service was wonderful,  delivery was on time!!!!.  Highly recommended!!!!

Avoid this place!!! Giving them 1 star is even too generous... when I was purchasing my furniture a woman was coming in complaining I ignored it when I shouldn't have!! i was talking to saleswomen name sendra she so rude !!! always she in the phone talking ... i was need to buy bedroomset and living room ... and  she dont care for customer ..

This is the most unprofessional business I have ever dealt with. I would not recommend anyone to do business here.I went in and purchased furniture and they advised they would call with a delivery date. I waited three days no call so I called no response.I live 25 minuets away from the location.I went in person and they advise it would be in by the next Wednesday. That Wednesday came no phone call didn’t hear anything. I called that Friday and they said that it did not come.These people do not know how to call you back and when I pop up they are all standing around.They told me it would be delivered tonight between 7 and 8pm. I waited and still nothing not one phone call to say they are running late or cannot make it till tomorrow.
I love this place so much, I bought a mirror from here and its wonderful. I would definitely be shopping here again soon!!! Thank you so muchhh.

We went to this store because a flyer was put out in the community, nothing that was on that flyer that they claimed was on sale was in the store. When we asked why not we were told it's to order by catalog so obviously the price was different & much higher. At this point we were annoyed, the lady saw that but didn't care to continue helping us and without a word just walked off to go to lunch. Comes back 30mins later after someone else that works there was going to sell us what we wanted to snatch the receipt clipboard from the young lady's hand talking about "oh I left cause I was hungry, but what you want all we have are floor samples. If you want a new one it's almost $200 more." I truly hate horrible customer service and false advertising and we got both in this place. Then to add insult to injury she was sarcastic when we said we were going to another store. She said " I know you'll be back I promise, real soon everyone does" We will never return or recommend this place to anyone.  We got better quality furniture 2 blocks down and great customer service, they earned the $3,800 we spent.

This has been my worst experience dealing with a furniture company ! Juan is the worst I’ve bwen waiting for my stuff to be delivered for almost 3 weeks now . You call and you get no answer this is horrible !!
Good quality
Horrible
(Translated by Google) cheap furniture bad customer service  (Original) muebles baratos mal servicio al cliente
Soo in love with my bedroom set 😍😍 Best store ever to shop best prices. Thanks

(Translated by Google) Excellent attention and very good quality in their products 100% recommended my house was spectacular. Thanks 1 Stop Shop Furniture!  (Original) Excelente atención y muy buena calidad en sus productos 100% recomendado mi casa quedó espectacular. Gracias 1 Stop Shop Furniture!
Happy customer definitely recommend this place. Best in NYC thank you.
Had such a great experience wine zainab
LOVE LOVE LOVE EVERYTHING ! Staff went above & beyond to get me everything I wanted and more. Very pleased & happy I decided to buy here. Definitely coming back ! Thank you so much guys.
Very unprofessional and dishonest business

Very upsetting from start to finish bed broke a few days later the dresser arrived damage spoke to the store owner promised resolution and never followed thru just have 1400$ worth of useless damage furniture and my purchase date was dec it’s March!!! I suggest going somewhere more professional and or you will get cheap furniture and the run around
Sleeper Sofa Delivery - The best in New York!
Great selection, reasonable prices and friendly staff!  Couldn't ask for more!
I bought a sleeper sofa from there, I am glad i choose this store. They made a delivery to my place. You will have many choices for a sleeper sofas
Great store .. nice staff.. it's highly recomended

Upon arrival into this store, the store manager, Ms. Veronica and Ms. Ceta were extremely hospitable. They told me about deals, financing options and other ideas for what I was looking for. They are extremely knowledgable about their products, catalouge and great with helping you finance your materials. Ms. Veronica works hard to crunch numbers while Cetas awesome eye is piecing together your vision. I love thecway I was treated here and Im a satisfied customer. I plan on becoming a lifelong customer screaming theur praises to the rest of the world. I highly recommend this location for all your needs. You wont regret it!!!
